title: Guinea declares first Ebola outbreak since 2016, after confirming 7 new cases linked to a funeral
content:
1. Guinea declares first Ebola outbreak since 2016, after confirming 7 new cases linked to a funeral  Business Insider
  2. Guinea Declares Ebola Outbreak as Disease Returns to West Africa  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  3. Guinea declares new Ebola epidemic, five years after West Africa’s deadliest outbreak  Washington Post
  4. WHO pledges urgent aid after Guinea health officials warn of new Ebola 'epidemic'  FRANCE 24 English
  5. Ebola Deaths Rise to Four in Guinea as Disease Flares Again  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 几内亚宣布自2016年以来首次爆发埃博拉疫情，此前确认7例新病例与葬礼有关。
幾內亞宣佈自2016年以來首次爆發埃博拉疫情，此前確認7例新病例與葬禮有關。
